s1.title: Why tweety?
s1.p: Some people found avalon very complex to get started with. We decided a good way to fix this was to provide an implementation specifically geared at learning how avalon works: tweety.

s1.title: Will you add feature XXX to tweety?
s1.p: Very unlikely. That would probably increase tweety in size and complexity, which we don't want.
